ovdesc.p: This is a generic template to hold all the lookups for data access service. Rather than creating sepearte tables for each fields, the user can define EB.LOOKUP definitions and use them as drop-down lists in applications. The ID of this file will be in the format of VIRTUAL TABLE NAME*REAL.KEY E.g STATUS*INDIVIDUAL
